valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 6 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 7 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 991 moving slowly east, losing its identity by 1800 Thursday. New low expected Bailey 990 by same time
